q: Print US ex-defence head Donald Rumsfeld defends Iraq war handling Former US Defence Donald Rumsfeld remains largely defiant about the Iraq war, saying in a new book that had Saddam Hussein remained in power, the Middle East would be far more perilous than it is today .
